page.title: 05POLLUTION
page.content: The pollution in New Mills/Disley area is bad.When people eat a packet of crisps they just throw the empty packet on the floor.There is a fine of Â£50 if you throw litter on the floor.The rubbish that people dump everywhere is disgraceful.There should be more bins around New Mills. The stream near our school is full of wood,metal,tyres and it looks an awful sight.There should be a few skips in New Mills.If people have rubbish that won't fit in the dustbin they should ask the dustbin men to collect it.The River Sett is polluted with dye caused by the mills and the fish are killed because of this.On the A.6.road there is a lot of car fumes and noise this affects the people who live near there. By Simon Maluszycki,David Lally and Wayne Arnfield.
